document.full_text: filmmaker julian schnabel on wednesday defended a screening of his new film "miral" at the united nations which drew the ire of israel and several u.s. jewish groups who see it as having a pro-palestinian message.
document.title: julian schnabel defends u.n. screening of "miral"
lines_and_colors: filmmaker julian schnabel on wednesday defended a screening of his new film "miral" at the united nations which drew the ire of israel and several u.s. jewish groups who see it as having a pro-palestinian message.
